name: Rescue From The Islands
description:
Game created in 3 hours for Trijam.

You are a sailor on a sinking boat. But you also have a mission - rescue people from the floating islands. Can you do this before your ship sinks?

Use Arrows or WASD to control your ship.



Code/Design : Rudey
3D Graphics : Low Poly Ultimate Pack : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
